item.title: Abby add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "There are two motives for reading a book; one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Abby add a quote by Lou Holtz
item.description: "When all is said and done, more is said than done." -- Lou Holtz

item.title: Abby add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Miracles occur, If you dare to call those spasmodic Tricks of radiance miracles. The wait's begun again, The long wait for the angel, For that rare, random descent." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Abby add a quote by Winston Groom
item.description: "Life is like a box of chocolates." -- Winston Groom

item.title: Abby add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Abby add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Abby add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Abby add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Abby add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Abby add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Abby add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Abby add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Music makes one feel so romantic - at least it always gets on one's nerves - which is the same thing nowadays." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Abby add a quote by John Foreman
item.description: "Music is what I do, Christ is why I do it" -- John Foreman

item.title: Abby add a quote by Bruce Springsteen
item.description: "Someday we'll look back on this and it will all seem funny." -- Bruce Springsteen

item.title: Abby add a quote by Ben Franklin
item.description: "There was never a bad peace or a good war." -- Ben Franklin

item.title: Abby add a quote by Ben Franklin
item.description: "Instead of cursing the darkness, light a candle." -- Ben Franklin

item.title: Abby add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Well done is better than well said." -- Benjamin Franklin
